name: An Apple a day keeps the Doctor away!
name_original: An Apple a day keeps the Doctor away!
description:
INTRO:

An Apple a day keeps the Doctor away! is a mini game I made for WeeklyGameJam 252.

My goal is to prove that Fruits (Here, apples) are good for health!

CONTROLS:

The controls are very simple!

SWIPE or ARROW KEYS to move.

OUTRO:

Check out my other mini game I made for the JAM:

  1.  An Apple a day keeps the Doctor away!
  2. Avoid Junk Food
  3. Fruit or Die
  4. Fruit.io
